item.title: Cohere just launched ‘North’, its biggest AI bet yet for privacy-focused enterprises
item.description: Cohere launches North, a secure enterprise AI platform outperforming Microsoft Copilot and Google Vertex AI in testing, with Royal Bank of Canada amon...

item.title: Smoke, reflections and portals: Adobe’s TransPixar takes AI VFX to the next level
item.description: Adobe and HKUST researchers unveil TransPixar, a breakthrough AI system that creates transparent visual effects from text prompts.

item.title: Microsoft makes powerful Phi-4 model fully open-source on Hugging Face
item.description: Phi-4 demonstrates that smaller, well-designed models can achieve comparable or superior results compared with larger models.

item.title: Vay expands its teledriving car service in Las Vegas
item.description: Vay is launching is expanding its teledriving car service, an Uber-like service where your car is driven by someone in a remote location.
